title: Stationary help
content:
I was hoping someone could ID the body font for me. I was easily familiar with Trajan Pro's large text, but the rest is stumping me.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110621041309im_/http:/typophile.com/files/FL24_5418.jpg)
author: BruinChiq

comments.content:
Looks like [bauhaus.](http://web.archive.org/web/20110621041309/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/ef/itc-bauhaus/)

It's hard to be certain given the size of the sample.
When I saw the W's I thought it was House Industries' Chalet London 1970, but now that I look at the e's, I think Bauhaus is it.
